15522.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「こ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>With this, I can perform the purification ritual.

15523.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「で:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Alright, I'll go to the Village Arena immediately.

15524.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「こ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>If you miss this, then who knows when the next

15525.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「こ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>O' God of War who watches over us here...
May today's victor meet even stronger warriors.

15526.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>And may they both be unafraid of death, and be

15527.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「こ: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>With that, the purification ritual is over.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15528.<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>「す:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>Amazing! It's always just been a short prayer; this is the

15529.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「戦:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Before every battle, we used to do this, to be honest.

15530.<start_lip_sync n01445 _normal m00001>「ね: <start_lip_sync n01445 _normal m00001>Hey, hey, Village King! What's with the salt and stuff?<stop_lip_animation n01445 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15531.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「こ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>We do that to soothe the souls of those who died in
battle here. ...And we offer up a prayer so they will
watch over us.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15532.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>...In the past, for the god who watches over this arena,
unimaginably gruesome battles to the death were fought
here almost every day.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15533.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「よ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>To create stronger people and to aim even higher.
Because it was the teachings of Rangao Village.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15534.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>For that reason... Everything was given to the victor,

15536.<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>「ハ: <start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>Yes, yes, yes!! I know!<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15537.<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>「今:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>Now it's not just the victor, but we pay the loser
respects as well, right!<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15538.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「…: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>...That's the way.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15539.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「死:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>For overcoming the fear of death and fighting with

the current teachings of the village.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15540.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「ラ:

15541.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「<:
